L1D0: That's weird, I dont remember there being floating platforms here.%bGood thing I got some training in yesterday!
L1D1: How the did the zombies even get in here?%b I hope there won't be any more of them in the buiding.
L1D2:
What was that thing?%bIt was as if I couldn't stop myself...
I gotta be on the lookout for those in the future!
L1D3:
Oh god!%bJust don't look down and it will be fine.
I got this.
L2D1: There are a lot of Zombies up there, I think I might need that Power-up
L2D3: I should have given more to chairty
L2D5: Oh god! That was a deadly en-counter
L2D6: I cant pee when im stressed out!
L2D4: I love living on the edge
L3D0:
Radio: *cracles* Come in Old Timer, this is General Cliffton, do you have the briefcase?%bMr. Old Timer: Affirmative, the briefcase is in my possession and
 I'm now trying to find my way to the roof of the building.%bRadio: Stellar work son, we'll have a chopper ready for you when you get there. Clifford out.%bMr. Old Timer: Oh boy, here I go killing again.
L3D1:
I should be close to the roof now. The content of this
briefcase better be worth all the trouble I have gone through.
L3D2: Luckily these don't blow up when it shoot them...%bBecause they're the wrong color.
L3D3:
TV: So far the origin of the virus is unknown
but it is causing major havoc all along the east coast.%bWhat even caused this outbreak in the first place?%bDid someone eat something they shouldn't have
or maybe it was manufactured by someone.
L3D4:
Mister Old Timer: Wow, this old toilet reminds me of...%bRadio: Look Old Timer, we don't have time for you to remeniss
about every little thing you find in the building, just hurry up to the LZ.%bMr. Old Timer: ..........%bMr. Old Timer: Copy that.
L3D5: Might as well grab myself a snack while I'm here.%bHmmm... Maybe Helena is related to the General somehow. His wife, friend, lover or a coworker.%bOr perhaps the content of the suitcase is sentimental?
L3D6: I'm really going to miss this view...%bIt's probably the last time I'll see it...%b...%b.....%b.......
L3D7:
People always hide the strangest things in these interstitial spaces.
The content here always seems so cut out from everything else.%bYou could call it cut content I suppose.
L3D8: Nice! I found some more shotgun shells!%bI was close to running out of ammo.
L3D9: Do I have time for a quick bath?%bIt may not look like it, but I'm covered in blood and gore.
L3D10: This is the ladder that leads to the roof.%bLet's hope that chopper is here in time.%bIt's also time for me to finally find out what is in this briefcase!.
